summary: This module provides the conversion logic that maps OpenAI-style embedding requests and responses to the format required by AWS Bedrock's Amazon Titan V2 embedding model and vice versa, encapsulating the necessary data structures and field transformations.
business_intent: Allow applications that use OpenAI's /v1/embeddings API to seamlessly operate with Amazon Titan V2 on Bedrock without changing their code, simplifying crossâ€‘platform embedding integration.
